Name: Secret Investigation
Description: The Patrollers near the Fireflies Sea seems to be in trouble. Learn about the situation before things get serious.
QuestDesc: The Patrollers near the Fireflies Sea seems to be in trouble. Learn about the situation before things get serious.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What now...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who are you...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great! I know you’re an excellent combatant. Can you please help me on this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m Qianshan, a Patroller from Public Security Bureau. I was on an undercover investigation mission.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can you see that Exile camp on the central island of Fireflies Sea? They are a subordinate of the Hall of Six.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I managed to capture some smuggled items and took them out. A response force will soon arrive to transport them, but another problem haunts me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I found a new lead from these items.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. It is quite a pain in the arse for Public Security Bureaus all across the lands.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It’s a cunning organization that covers its illegal conducts with seemingly legal ones on the surface. The close-knit operations and the complicated relationships among its branches make it almost impossible for the Public Security Bureaus to wipe it out in one swoop.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My mission was meant to find new evidences from within this fortification, so that a coordinated raid with other PSBs can be made possible.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These Exiles will help the Hall of Six to ship some Tacetite Weapons from Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have to get access to the details of this operation, but as you can see, we are undermanned now...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If I return, not only will I be subject to distrust, but these captured items might not be transported in time...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So I wonder if you are available to find the operation details of their weapon shipment for us?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great, thanks!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You’ll have to infiltrate their ranks to find out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you just fight your way into the camp, the records might be destroyed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That’s why you have to get some disguise.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why don’t you get an Exile outfit first?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Um... we don’t have another choice, because the outfit I used was already disposed of...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Finished collecting so quickly?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me have a look. You haven’t got them all it seems. Keep looking!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great. Impressive efficiency.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me look. Right, you have them all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, don’t rush! The Exiles are not so smart, but they’re definitely not idiots.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Recently rumors around the camp have been talking about an undercover guy among them. You could well raise doubts if you just walk there like this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have a fake identity for you, and some people information of this camp, just in case. You better master them all! Or you’ll give the game away as soon as you talk.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It’s not so hard I think... I’ve filtered out a lot of irrelevant information. The original paper took me three whole days to master!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This camp is a totally different one from other Exile camps, because the boss is relentless and the members are all suspicious.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You will be all on your own this time among these people, so the information could well save your life at key moments.

Options.PlotLineKey: You put together all of this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, my late partner Shenhai did.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C’mon, try to master them. I’ll check up on you in a while.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover! Are you okay?

Options.PlotLineKey: Here's all we've gathered so far.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great. Leave the rest to us. We will give them what they deserve. Both this camp and the Hall of Six.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for your help! Please take the reward.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right. Mastered all of them?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you have, I’ll ask you a few questions. And we’ll start the mission if you answer them right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, I’ll wait.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great. Question number 1. What did the mother of Qiao Sheng and Qiao Yang do for a living?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Correct. Well done. You remember things fast.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Incorrect. Their mother was a teacher! You have to remember it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Incorrect. Their mother was a teacher! You have to remember it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Question number 2. What was the reason for the injury on Qiao Sheng’s right leg?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Correct. You sure are reliable, aren’t you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Incorrect. The injury was due to an attempted shoplifting at the age of 9.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Incorrect. The injury was due to an attempted shoplifting at the age of 9.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Question number 3. What does Kuixiao, a friend of Qiao Sheng’s at the camp like doing?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Correct. You were very careful when you read the material, weren’t you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Incorrect. The meat lover is Zaijia. Kuixiao likes studying technologies. Don’t mistake them for one another!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Incorrect. The combat lover is Daji. Kuixiao likes studying technologies. Don’t mistake them for one another!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We still got some time. According to the info we got earlier, they will be checking the stocks today. It might not be the best timing we go in.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qianshan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let’s start the mission tomorrow evening. You can keep mastering the material with this time.
